Reason: The 'concurrent_writes' configuration option in the Cassandra software project is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the system's ability to handle multiple write operations concurrently. Increasing the value of 'concurrent_writes' can lead to higher throughput and reduced write latency, while decreasing it can result in bottlenecks and decreased performance. Therefore, changes in the value of this configuration option significantly affect system performance, making it performance-sensitive.
